verses.text: \w And|strong="H1697"\w* God \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*.
\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* other gods \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w below|strong="H8478"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* generations \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w Me|strong="H8130"\w*,

\w but|strong="H4687"\w* \w showing|strong="H6213"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand generations \w of|strong="H4687"\w* \w those|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w Me|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H5352"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w takes|strong="H5375"\w* \w His|strong="H5375"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*.
\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* keeping \w it|strong="H6942"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w labor|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*—\w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* maidservant \w or|strong="H3808"\w* livestock, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* within \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w rested|strong="H5117"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w apart|strong="H6942"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.

\w Honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mother, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.
\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H7523"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w murder|strong="H7523"\w*.
\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*.
\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bear|strong="H6030"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H7453"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s wife, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* maidservant, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w witnessed|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w lightning|strong="H3940"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sounding \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* enveloped \w in|strong="H5975"\w* smoke, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w trembled|strong="H5128"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w*.

“\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H6435"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w*,” \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. “\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* let God \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H6435"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

“Do \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* replied. “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* God \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w test|strong="H5254"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w keep|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w sinning|strong="H2398"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w thick|strong="H6205"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* God \w was|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* gods alongside \w Me|strong="H6213"\w*; \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* yourselves gods \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* goats \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*. \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H6629"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w stones|strong="H1496"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w stones|strong="H1496"\w* shaped \w by|strong="H5921"\w* tools; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w use|strong="H2490"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* chisel \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*, lest \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w exposed|strong="H1540"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.’
